Module com.order.navigationdesign

Class BuildYourOwnController

java.lang.Object
com.order.navigationdesign.BuildYourOwnController
public class BuildYourOwnController extends Object
This class defines the Controller for the BuildYourOwnView.
Author:
Patryk Dziedzic, Aveesh Patel

    On the click of the add button, a specific topping goes from the additional toppings to the selected toppings

    On the click of the remove button, a specific topping goes from the selected toppings to the additional toppings
    private void
    resetSizeSauceCheese()
    Resets the pizza size to small, selects the tomato sauce button, deselects the extra sauce and extra cheese button if selected, and resets the priceTextField
    private void
    resetToppings()
    Takes all the selected toppings from the associated list and puts them into the additional toppings list to "reset" building the pizza
